name: UpdateCartLineItem
description:
Update a specific cart line item in Mailchimp.

Use this tool to modify an existing cart line item in a specified e-commerce store within Mailchimp. This can be used to adjust item details such as quantity or other attributes.

parameters.name: store_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the e-commerce store. Essential for specifying which store's cart line item to update.

parameters.name: cart_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the cart.

parameters.name: cart_line_item_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the line item within the cart to be updated.

value_schema.description: The id for the line item of a cart.

parameters.name: product_identifier
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the product associated with the cart line item.

value_schema.description: A unique identifier for the product associated with the cart line item.

parameters.name: product_variant_identifier
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the product variant associated with the cart line item. Required to specify which variant to update.

value_schema.description: A unique identifier for the product variant associated with the cart line item.

parameters.name: cart_line_item_quantity
parameters.description: The quantity of the cart line item to update.

value_schema.description: The quantity of a cart line item.

parameters.name: cart_line_item_price
parameters.description: The price of a cart line item to be updated.

value_schema.description: The price of a cart line item.
